# Glacial Ward (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 96

A faint, shimmering reddish energy encases the subjectâ€™s body, granting spell resistance 18 against fire spells and spell-like abilities. In addition, any creature using a fire-based supernatural ability on the subject (such as a breath weapon) must succeed on a DC 18 level check (1d20 + level or HD) to affect a creature warded by this spell.
